Package oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits

Class AbstractObject

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.AbstractObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClickableObject, DrawableObject, ObjectWithAPosition, UpdatableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditModelObject, ModelButtonObject, StartHighlightObject, StringObject
public abstract class AbstractObject extends Object implements ObjectWithAPosition, DrawableObject, UpdatableObject, ClickableObject
Superclass for all objects in the model.

  • Method Details

    • getPosition

      public Vector2D getPosition()
      Obtains the position vector of this AbstractObject
      Specified by:
      getPosition in interface ObjectWithAPosition
      Returns:
      the position

    • update

      public final void update()
      Update method. areaRectangle is moved to be centered around the position of this object. Then it calls individualObject for the subclass-specific bits.
      Specified by:
      update in interface UpdatableObject

    • individualUpdate

      abstract void individualUpdate()
      Subclass-specific update method. Needs to be overridden.

    • draw

      public final void draw​(Graphics2D g)
      A method to draw this object. translates the argument's affine transform by the position, calls individualDraw(g) for this object, then resets the transform to how it was before it got translated.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface DrawableObject
      Parameters:
      g - the graphics2D context being used to draw this object.

    • individualDraw

      abstract void individualDraw​(Graphics2D g)
      Subclass-specific draw method.
      Parameters:
      g - the graphics context being used.

    • checkIntersectWithArea

      public boolean checkIntersectWithArea​(Area a)
      Check whether or not this object's areaRectangle intersects with a particular area
      Parameters:
      a - the area that this object is being checked against
      Returns:
      true if it intersects, false otherwise.

    • wasClicked

      public boolean wasClicked​(Point clickLocation)
      Check whether or not this object's areaRectangle contains the clickLocation point
      Specified by:
      wasClicked in interface ClickableObject
      Parameters:
      clickLocation - the point that this areaRectangle is being checked against
      Returns:
      true if areaRectangle contains clickLocation

    • move

      public void move​(Vector2D moveVector)
      Call this whenever this object needs to be moved by a certain vector. Adds the moveVector to this object's position.
      Parameters:
      moveVector - the vector2D representing the movement that needs to be done by this object
